title: Can I be sued for using copyrighted music in my Instagram videos? - Quora
tags: Legal Issues and Law in Everyday Life

response.answer_text: Can you be? Yes. Will you be? Probably not unless you are making a lot of money off of it. You can't get blood from a rock so they would probably look at your financial situation and decide if it was worth it or not. If you're not rich or making a lot of money my posting the video they probably would not Sue but would rather just take your channel down
Yes. But most likely they’ll just tell Instagram to remove your videos, if Instagram doesn’t do it themselves.
Yes. But also, Instagram prohibit using copyright material without permission (as do most other websites). Instagram Help Center
